summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1417, for the improvement of 6th Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard at Charles Street to its intersection with Charlestown Street to 8th Avenue South; by the construction of a plank roadway 30 feet in width with wooden walks 6 feet along one side thereof, under Ordinance No. 15463 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
